The constant mind is the Way.
The hand that believes becomes gold.
The beautiful woman with rouge and powder.
Gives rise to the supreme opportunity.
The golden-colored monk.
Has no place to put his body.
Recites the spell of wisdom.
Sings the song of great peace.
All are unheard of by the various schools.
The later people are inspired.
The other wonderful words cannot be discussed exhaustively.
Broadly in the brief records.
Merely as a warning, I say.

spreading like branches and leaves.
The ancient moon of Shishuang,
reappears at Haihui.
Located in the ancestral mountains,
it is hidden like a rival state.
Who is the master of this land?
Master Yuan is the man.

analyzed: 演公系本蜀川令行淮甸。

Within the way of benevolence and righteousness, empty flowers bear fruit.

Monk Keqin recorded his essential teachings,

Master Yuan of Haihui,

He encountered a good teacher.
Seated on a lion's seat.

Doing nothing.
Speaking nothing.

All directions converge.
The four assemblies look up to him.
Not knowing his reason.
All are lost.
The master alone looked at him and laughed.

analyzed: 莫逆於心。 曾未踰時。

He was finally entrusted with the prediction.
Celestial beings harmoniously praised him.
Residing at Tai Ping from the four directions.
Father and son succeeding each other.
Coming to Hai Hui from Tai Ping.
Answering questions according to the capacity of the listener.
Raising up the matter based on the circumstances.
Not relying on novelty.
Naturally extraordinary.
His disciples compiled it.
Asking me to write a preface for it.
Wishing to transmit it to the world, it is said.
